title: FS: T206 Harry Howell Portrait....Broad Leaf 350
author: Archive

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Harry Howell Portrait....Broad Leaf 350
posts.post_content:
Posted By: David M
I have a raw Harry Howell T206 Portrait BROAD LEAF 350 back.  The card has a hairline wrinkle about 3/4" long above his head and is altered with what appears to be white out at the top of the card to help cover up some chipping I guess.  The card is generally nice and may be fixed but I will not try it.  The back is rare and the printing is clean.  I will take offers on this to my email: three4moore@yahoo.com

Thanks....David
